articles.title: K-Pop superstars BTS call for a stop to Asian hate following tragic Atlanta shooting - Daily Mail
articles.description: The band have joined the #StopAsianHate and #StopAAPIHate movement following anti-Asian violence in the US, and the group's members released a joint statement on Tuesday.
articles.content:
K-Pop superstars BTS have called for an end to Asian hate following the tragic Atlanta shooting, in which six Asian women were among eight people murdered.
